nodes.text: CoMar Combat Systems, also called CoMar Weapons, was a weapons manufacturing corporation, based in the Corporate Sector. They specialized in surface-to-air weaponry, and one of their more widely used pieces of equipment was the G-003 Tri-Tracker, which was used by both the Galactic Empire and the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. They also manufactured the SLD-26 planetary shield generator.
